mapper.select: select bbs.id id1,bbs.title,bbs.summary,bbs.createdAt,bbs.authorId,bbs.commentCount, u.id,u.username,u.signature,u.photo, c.id cid,c.name from bbs,`user` u,category c where bbs.authorId = u.id and bbs.categoryId = c.id order by createdAt desc

select bbs.id id1,bbs.title,bbs.createdAt,bbs.authorId,bbs.createdAt,bbs.content,bbs.commentCount,bbs.categoryId, u.id,u.username,u.photo from bbs,`user` u where bbs.id = #{id} and bbs.authorId = u.id
select c.*, u.photo photo from comment c ,`user` u where c.bbsid = #{id} and u.id=c.userid order by date desc
mapper.update: update bbs set commentCount = commentCount +1 where id=#{id}
update bbs set commentCount = commentCount -1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select bbs.id id1,bbs.title,bbs.summary,bbs.createdAt,bbs.authorId,bbs.commentCount, u.id,u.username,u.photo,u.signature, c.id cid,c.name from bbs,`user` u,category c where bbs.authorId = u.id and bbs.categoryId = c.id and categoryId=#{cid} order by createdAt desc
select count(1) from bbs where authorId=#{id}
select bbs.id,title,createdAt from bbs where authorId=#{id} order by createdAt desc

select id,title,authorId,categoryId,createdAt from bbs
and categoryId = (select id from category where name=#{bbs.category.name})
and authorId = (select id from user where username=#{bbs.user.username})
and title like '%${bbs.title}%'
limit #{startRow},#{size}
